Class InvalidHostException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable

        • java.io.IOException
          • com.paydiant.android.core.exception.InvalidHostException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class InvalidHostException
extends IOException
    This exception will be thrown when attempting to make a connection to an invalid or unverified host.

    7.1.0.2.a
